description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8oovq","text":"BaseScope in situ hybridization on mouse brain sections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ea8vt","text":"Use 35μM floating brain sections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53ag7","text":"Wash sections 3 times (5 minutes) in PBS to remove cryoprotectant solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c852t","text":"Mount tissue onto Superfrost plus slides","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fote5","text":"Dry slides at room temp and then dip in mQ H2O to remove salt","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":44,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3669u","text":"Dry slides at 60°C for 2 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9267h","text":"Let tissue dry at room temp overnight – make sure tissue is completely stuck to slides ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cvic4","text":"Dry slides at 60°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19qr7","text":"Dehydrate slides in 50%, 70%, 100% EtOH, for 5 min each at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jb1r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bdg0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":23,"style":"sub"}],"key":"4107p","text":"Use sterile distilled H2O for the rest of the protocol","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a9q7e","text":"Let slides air dry for 5 min at room temp. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9i46","text":"Make 200mL Target Retrieval Reagent (1:10 180mL H2O + 20mL 10X Target Retrieval Reagent) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kt5s","text":"On the bench – add 5-8 drops of Hydrogen Peroxide to tissue sections ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5gms5","text":"Incubate at room temp for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"85i35","text":"Rinse slides 2 times in H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h0hc","text":"In the steamer heat one dish of H2O and one dish of Target Retrieval Reagent","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":33,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6mpbp","text":"Check temp of Target retrieval reagent (must be at least 95°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g0kh","text":"After preheating – place slides into H2O for 10 sec to acclimate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35vmd","text":"Move slides to Target Retrieval Reagent and steam for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3po8k","text":"Remove the water container and the container with slides from the steamer and place on the bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pj08","text":"Wash slides in H2O for 15 sec at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kar8","text":"Wash slides in 100% EtOH for 3 min at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"rp3j","text":"Dry slides at 60°C for ≥5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50tar","text":"Submerge in dish of H2O and move slides up and down 3-5 times for each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":21,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7lr3r","text":"Let slides cool on the bench for 20 -30 minutes (wait until temperature of water container has dropped to 30°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4po9i","text":"Use an Immedge hydrophobic barrier pen to draw a barrier around your tissue section(s)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9o1cs","text":"Let the barrier dry ≥ 1 min or overnight at room temp (you can take a break at this point)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35bsn","text":"Turn on RNA Scope oven – set to 40°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"uu75","text":"Wet humidifying paper (filter paper) completely with H2O and place in the Humidity Control Tray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3gdd8","text":"Warm the covered tray in the oven for 30 minutes before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"30mmc","text":"Place slides in slide rack and add ~5 drops of Protease IV","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ook2","text":"Incubate in pre-warmed RNAscope oven in the humidity tray at 40°C for 30 min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2sud","text":"Wash slides in H2O at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecdvl","text":"Prepare 1L of wash buffer (20mL of 50X Wash buffer + 980mL H2O)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":60,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dclsq","text":"Heat 50X wash buffer to 40°C for 10-20 min before making 1X wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vgon","text":"Equilibrate each BaseScope reagent and probe to room temp for 30 min before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jn73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hniq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dheff","text":"Important: Do not let sections dry out between incubation steps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63prh","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dsmf","text":"All incubation steps are in the slide rack – remove slides from slide rack to wash between incubations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":102}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c7ui","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbne1","text":"For the incubations in the HybEZ oven – cover the slide rack with the lid and make sure to lock the oven so that the water in the humidity chamber does not evaporate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":166}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f1c4f","text":"      Add ~4 drops of BaseScope probe to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o0t6","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 2 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ddu0e","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6unni","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP1 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"616nl","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"17kri","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag34b","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP2 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dvs8","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5r0lk","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69rlr","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP3 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31ata","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e3ltc","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4lo7","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP4 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8tf9","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fd3f3","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c9u","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP5 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tjgp","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kjhq","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9iuo6","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP6 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfmba","text":"Incubate in the oven at 40°C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4c0la","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56o2c","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP7 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9faqu","text":"Incubate at room temp for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ep70d","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eiupe","text":"Staining intensity can be modified by adjusting the AMP7 incubation time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"958hp","text":"Add ~4 drops of AMP8 to completely cover tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jv4n","text":"Incubate on the bench at room temp for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ra8q","text":"Wash 2 times in Wash Buffer at room temp - 2 min each wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e75nu","text":"Prepare BaseScope Fast RED working solution (1:60 ratio)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"es1qu","text":"Spin down BaseScope Fast RED-B before using","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cef4t","text":"2uL RED-B + 120uL RED-A : mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33itu","text":"Use the Fast Red solution within 5 minutes – do not expose to direct sunlight or UV light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8idtb","text":"Add ~120µL Fast Red solution to each slide / section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"821kh","text":"Cover sections on tray to protect from light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7565j","text":"Incubate at room temp for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j8dg","text":"Rinse 2 times in H2O at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":18,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b9d3a","text":"Dry slides at 60°C for ≥ 15 min (until slides are completely dry)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"deh87","text":"The red substrate is alcohol sensitive. DO NOT dehydrate the slides in alcohol, and make sure your reagents are not contaminated with alcohol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":143}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4oqjv","text":"Place 1-2 drops of VectaMount or Ecomount on the slide and coverslip the tissue sections. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a96v7","text":"Dry slides at room temp for ≥ 5 min   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpt74","text":"We are done with the oven – but keep using the slide rack for incubations at room temp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":86}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: BaseScope In Situ Hybridization
